name: Red Box Search
labels: redbow search quick fast browser chrome firefox ie
short_description: Red Box Search is a desktop application that allows you to search Red Box without the need to launch the website first. Just type in a query and click and it will launch the browser, search  and pull up results a lot quicker than just going to the actual website. I am in to way affiliated with Red Box Corporation, only trying to make like easier.
summary: Red Box Search is a desktop application that allows you to search.
